amendment.description: To increase by $1,500,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated to the Navy for research within the High-Brightness Electron Source program, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1560 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1560 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To increase by $1,500,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated to the Navy for research within the High-Brightness Electron Source program, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1560 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1560 proposed by Senator Warner.
